about_the_game:
This game is yet another City-Builder. What did you expect when you clicked on it?

In the day you control your character around, build a city, and invite new people that will work for you.
These people will work in many different positions, from resource harvesting, over food generation, to military tasks, you assign the profession, but keep in mind, if you get to know your people, they might tell you their favorite profession, and after all, a happy worker is more efficient than an unhappy one!
Every person Invited to your city has their own personality, dreams, and wishes. Maybe you even manage to marry one :)

In the night, you are attacked by different factions, maybe its just some wild animals (free food whoop whoop), maybe its another city, or maybe something else entirely...
Use the day to train soldiers, craft and equip weapons, and build defensive buildings, so that your city will not be run over during the night!
